page.title: 14FIRMS: CHERRY WILLINGHAM
page.content: In Cherry Willingham there are no major firms. Cherry Willingham has 17 shops employing about 40 staff although the shops are not all in one place in the village. There are five local builders who employ about 25 staff. The three paper shops employ local teenagers to deliver the newspapers. There is a small woodworking firm in Reepham although a major change is taking place on the edge of our block with the building of the 'Welton Oil Field' which will include a railway siding. The local schools- there are four of them- also employ dinner ladies and cleaners. Other than that the majority of people go into Lincoln to find employment. At Greetwell there is a quarry which employs about 30 people. S.PROCTOR
